titles.title: Freedom's Way National Heritage Area Act of 2021
Freedom's Way National Heritage Area Act of 2021
A bill to reauthorize the Freedom's Way National Heritage Area, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Freedom's Way National Heritage Area Act of 2021
This bill extends through FY2036 the authority of the Department of the Interior to provide financial assistance for the Freedom's Way National Heritage Area in Massachusetts and New Hampshire.
The bill removes the limit on the total amount that may be appropriated for the heritage area.
